space.arim.universal.events

Class UniversalEvents

  • java.lang.Object
    • space.arim.universal.events.UniversalEvents
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Events

    public final class UniversalEvents
extends Object
implements Events
    UniversalEvents: Main class

    Used for retrieving Events instances:
    * get()
    * getByClass(Class)
    * threadLocal()
    * getOrDefault(Class, Supplier)

    A248

      • DEFAULT_ID

        public static final String DEFAULT_ID
        The main instance id

        Equivalent to UniversalUtil.DEFAULT_ID
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • threadLocal

        public static ThreadLocal<Events> threadLocal()
        Events instances are thread safe; however, you may wish for a thread specific instance nonetheless.
        Returns:
        ThreadLocal a ThreadLocal

      • getByClass

        public static Events getByClass(Class<?> clazz)
        Retrieves an Events instance by class. If no instance for the classname exists, a new one is created.

        This is the preferred approach to using your own Events instances.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class
        Returns:
        the instance. If none exists, a new instance is created.

      • getOrDefault

        public static Events getOrDefault(Class<?> clazz,
                                  Supplier<Events> defaultSupplier)
        Gets an Events instance by class with a default value, issued by the Supplier, if it does not exist.

        This method is useful for checking for a specific instance and falling back to a default value.
        Parameters:
        clazz - see getByClass(Class)
        defaultSupplier - from which to return back default values.
        Returns:
        the instance if it exists, otherwise the default value

      • get

        public static Events get()
        Gets the main Events instance
        Returns:
        the instance

      • getId

        public String getId()
        Returns the id of this UniversalEvents instance.
        This method is purposefully not exposed since it is not part of the officially supported API.
        Returns:
        String the id

      • getUtil

        public Util getUtil()
        Description copied from interface: Events
        Gets the Util instance corresponding to this event manager.

        The returned Util instance is the same one used to validate the truthfulness of Event.isAsynchronous() values.
        Specified by:
        getUtil in interface Events
        Returns:
        Util the accompanying utility instance

      • fireEvent

        public <E extends Event> boolean fireEvent(E event)
        Description copied from interface: Events
        Fires an event, invoking all applicable listeners.
        If Event.isAsynchronous() returns untruthfully, an unchecked exception is thrown.
        Specified by:
        fireEvent in interface Events
        Type Parameters:
        E - event
        Parameters:
        event - the event itself
        Returns:
        false if the event is a Cancellable and was cancelled, true otherwise
        See Also:
        Cancellable

      • register

        public void register(Listener listener)
        Description copied from interface: Events
        Registers an object to listen to events.

        In the object registered, listening methods must have the Listen annotation.
        Specified by:
        register in interface Events
        Parameters:
        listener - the object to register

      • unregister

        public void unregister(Listener listener)
        Description copied from interface: Events
        Unregister an object from any listening.

        Opposite of Events.register(Listener)
        Specified by:
        unregister in interface Events
        Parameters:
        listener - the object to unregister
